name: flowcrypt-browser
description: Simple end-to-end encryption to secure email and attachments on Google.

scripts.pretest: npm run-script build --silent && cd conf && node ../build/tooling/tsc-compiler --project tsconfig.test.json
scripts.pretest-incremental: npm run-script build-incremental --silent && cd conf && node ../build/tooling/tsc-compiler --project tsconfig.test.json
scripts.test: npm run-script test_buf && npm run-script test_tslint && npm run-script test_patterns && npm run-script test_async_stack && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer -- -- --pool-size=1
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_mock: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer -- -- --pool-size=1 --debug
scripts.test_local_chrome_enterprise_mock: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_enterprise -- -- --pool-size=1 --debug
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_live_gmail: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer_live_gmail -- -- --pool-size=1 --debug
scripts.test_local_chrome_consumer_mock_flaky: npm run-script pretest && npm run-script test_ci_chrome_consumer_flaky -- -- --pool-size=1 --retry=false --debug
scripts.test_local_unit_consumer: npm run-script pretest && node ./node_modules/ava/cli --timeout=20m --verbose --concurrency=1 build/test/test/source/test.js -- UNIT-TESTS --retry=false --pool-size=1 --debug CONSUMER-MOCK
scripts.test_local_unit_enterprise: npm run-script pretest && node ./node_modules/ava/cli --timeout=20m --verbose --concurrency=1 build/test/test/source/test.js -- UNIT-TESTS --retry=false --pool-size=1 --debug ENTERPRISE-MOCK
scripts.test_tslint: npx tslint --project ./tsconfig.json --config ./conf/tslint.yaml && npx tslint --project ./conf/tsconfig.content_scripts.json --config ./conf/tslint.yaml && npx tslint --project ./conf/tsconfig.test.json --config ./conf/tslint.test.yaml
scripts.run_firefox: npm run-script build-incremental && npx web-ext run --source-dir ./build/firefox-consumer/ --firefox-profile ~/.mozilla/firefox/flowcrypt-dev --keep-profile-changes
scripts.run_firefox_windows: npm run-script build-incremental && npx web-ext run --source-dir ./build/firefox-consumer/ --firefox-profile %userprofile%/AppData/Local/Mozilla/Firefox/Profiles/flowcrypt-dev --keep-profile-changes
scripts.find_unused: ts-prune -p tsconfig.json | grep -v extension/types | grep -v extension/js/common/core

author: FlowCrypt Limited
